Description: Mullingar Pewter Pocket Watch With Shamrock And Trinity Design And Celtic Border Click to enlarge -Pewter Quality -Shamrock with Trinity Design -Open Back -Celtic Border -Boxed The pocket watch is undoubtedly one of the most timeless and elegant accessories. The clear and uncluttered watch face is easy to read and the proportions mean it's a delight to hold and open. The chain can be secured to a waistcoat, belt loop or lapel. This pocket watch encaptures all the traditional and vintage feel of an antique clock piece while the open back and embossed design gives it a distinctive modern and Irish edge ShippingDelivery is charged based on the country we are shipping to. Please select your country and delivery service. All orders are same day dispatched (Monday - Friday, Saturday and Sunday orders are dispatched on Monday). If your order has not arrived on-time, simply contact our Customer Support Team who will track and help you to receive your order. To make this easy please use the following information to allow us easily identify your order or to deal easily with your query: eBay user name eBay Order number eBay Item ID Your Carrolls Irish Gifts order ID (from your delivery notification) ReturnsI have changed my mind and wish to return my item for a refund? You must contact us within 14 days of receiving your order. Please include your order reference number and full name. The item you wish to return must be unused, in the original packaging and in a saleable condition. Refunds may be accepted on all items except perishable goods, earrings and underwear and exclude shipping charges. All items will be inspected on return. My item is damaged, what can I do? Please contact us -- include your order reference number and full name. Please also include an image of the item showing the damage. Once verified, we can then work with you on a suitable resolution. I want to Exchange an Item? You must contact us within 14 days of receiving your order. Please include your order reference number and full name. The item you wish to exchange must be unused, in the original packaging and in a saleable condition. Exchanges may be accepted on all items except perishable goods, earrings and underwear. All items will be inspected on return. Once we receive the original item(s) from you, we will reach out to you for payment of the re-shipment and any other additional charges (if applicable) charges and can then ship the replacement(s) immediately.
